chapter.text: (Allah swears) by the winds that scatter and disperse
And those that pick up a heavy load (of moisture)
Yet, glide through so easily
Then, they distribute and apportion (rain) per His command
That which you are promised, (the afterlife), is certainly the absolute truth
Indeed, the reckoning of deeds is just bound to occur
And (He swears) by the sky with orbits (of countless celestial bodies)
In fact, you (skeptics) hold (different and) diverse views (about life, death and after death)
Kept away (from the truth) is the one who has a hatred (for it)
Damned are those who conjecture
Immersed (in ignorance), they are preoccupied (by their preconceived ideas)
They ask, "When would that day of reckoning arrive
That day, they would be tormented by fire
(Here)! Taste (the outcome of) your misdeeds. This is (precisely) what you had so eagerly demanded to be hastened
(That day), those who fear (Allah) would be in (the blissful) gardens of paradise, amid springs
(Gratefully) accepting whatever (blessings) their Lord would grant them. Indeed, prior to this (in their life) they used to act righteously
They did not sleep much at night, but only a part of the time
And before dawn (late at night), they sought forgiveness (for their sins)
And (they accepted the fact that) the deprived and the destitute had a rightful share in their wealth
For those who have a firm faith, there are (convincing) signs on this earth
And even in your own selves. So then, do you not notice
In the sky is your sustenance; and that which you are being promised (the afterlife)
And (I swear) by the Lord of the heavens and the earth! It _ (the afterlife) _ is indeed an absolute reality! Just like the reality that you have the power of speech and diction
Has the story of the honored guests of Ibraheem reached you
When they came to him, they said, "Peace!" Ibraheem replied, "Peace!" Folks appear to be strangers
Then he went (inside the house) to his family, and brought back a fattened (roasted) calf
And placed it before them, then said, "Why don´t you eat
(They did not eat, and so) he felt afraid of them. They said, "Do not be afraid!" And they gave him the good news of a learned son
His wife came forward, slapped her forehead and exclaimed loudly, "(I am) old and barren
They said, "Despite that, precisely! Your Lord has said that He is the Wisest, the most Aware
(Ibraheem) said, "So what is your mission, oh you messengers
They said, "We have been sent towards a criminal nation, (the people of Loot)
To rain upon them stones of baked clay
Earmarked (especially) by your Lord for the transgressors
(But first) We evacuated from the town anyone who was a believer
There, We did not find more than a single house of the believers
In that town, We left behind (nothing except) signs for those who fear the painful punishment
And (We left signs) in (the saga of) Musa, when We sent him to the pharaoh with a distinct and definite authority
But the pharaoh relied on his might, and turned away (in arrogance); and said, "(He is) a magician, or (else he is) just plain mad
Therefore, We grabbed him and his armies and dumped them in the sea; he was damned
And (there are signs in the history of) the nation of ´Aads´, when We sent upon them the blighted lethal wind
It did not spare a thing. Whatever it touched, it (churned and) turned into dust and debris
In (the fate of) the people of ´Samood´, (there are signs)! They were told, "Enjoy yourself for just a while
They displayed contempt for the command of their Lord. So a bolt of lightning struck them, while they looked on (helplessly)
They could neither stand on their feet, nor help themselves
And prior to them, (We destroyed) the people of Nooh. They were indeed a rebellious sinful nation
With Our power and prowess, We brought into being the universe. And indeed, We expand it (steadily)
And We have spread out the earth. (Observe)! How aptly did We stretch it
We have created everything in pairs. Perhaps you would bear that in mind
(Say), "And (hurry), run towards Allah. I am really an obvious warner from Him to you
And do not assign a god (for worship), along with Allah! I´m really a clear warner from Him to you
Thus, the same was said about every messenger who came before them, "(He is) a magician! A lunatic
Do they leave this remark as a legacy (for future generations)? No! They are the defiant sinners, all of them
Turn away from them. You share no blame
But continue to remind them. Of course, the reminder (always) helps the believers
I have not created the jinn and the human kind, (for any reason) except that they should worship Me
I want no riches from them, and do not want them to feed Me
Indeed, the provider of sustenance (for all beings) is Allah, the One with absolute Power and matchless Might
Indeed! The evildoers of the present day shall have the same fate as those of their companions (in hellfire), the evil doers of the past. So, let them not ask Me to hasten (the Day of Judgment)
So, on that day of theirs, the promised day, there shall be (nothing but) misery for those who disbelieve
